scripts.copy-shared: mkdir -p ./src/services && cp ../src/services/matchingAlgorithm.ts ./src/services/matchingAlgorithm.ts && cp ../src/services/matchingService.ts ./src/services/matchingService.ts && cp ../src/services/blockingService.ts ./src/services/blockingService.ts && cp ../src/services/promptsService.ts ./src/services/promptsService.ts && cp ../src/services/preferencesService.ts ./src/services/preferencesService.ts && cp ../types.ts ./src/types.ts && cp ../firebaseAdmin.ts ./src/firebaseAdmin.ts && sed -i.bak "s|from '../../firebaseAdmin'|from '../firebaseAdmin'|g" ./src/services/*.ts && sed -i.bak "s|from '../../types'|from '../types'|g" ./src/services/*.ts && rm -f ./src/services/*.bak ./src/*.bak
scripts.build: npm run copy-shared && npm run lint:fix && tsc
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
